title: Eligibility & Admission Process 2025
category: Undergraduate (UG) Programs under General / Foreign / NRI category

programs.name: Bachelor of Medicine & Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS)

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, Biology / Biotechnology and English individually from a recognized Board, with a minimum 50% marks taken together in Physics, Chemistry and Biology / Biotechnology
Candidates are advised to check NEET 2025 Brochure for the final eligibility criteria

admission_process_general: Register, Appear and Qualify in NEET UG 2025
Online Registration & Choice Filling by candidates on MCC / KEA / JCECEB portal
Online counseling & Seat allotment by MCC / KEA / JCECEB
Reporting to the Institute as per the reporting instructions uploaded on www.manipal.edu/neet
admission_process_foreign_nri: Register, Appear and Qualify in NEET UG 2025
Online Registration & Choice Filling by candidates on MCC portal
Online counseling & Seat allotment by MCC
Reporting to the Institute as per the reporting instructions uploaded on www.manipal.edu/neet
notes: Deemed University Counseling by Medical Counseling Committee (MCC): KMC Manipal, KMC Mangalore & MTMC Jamshedpur
State Counseling by Karnataka Examination Authority (KEA): KMC Mangalore
State Counseling by Jharkhand Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (JCECEB): MTMC Jamshedpur
Visit www.manipal.edu/neet for reporting instructions, after Seat allotment
The minimum age for admission shall be 17 years on or before 31st December of the year in which admission is sought.

programs.name: Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS)
institutions: Manipal College of Dental Sciences (MCODS), Manipal
Manipal College of Dental Sciences (MCODS), Mangalore

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry, Biology / Biotechnology and English individually from a recognized Board, with a minimum of 50% marks taken together in Physics, Chemistry and Biology / Biotechnology.
Candidates are advised to check NEET 2025 Brochure for the final eligibility criteria

admission_process_general: Register, Appear and Qualify in NEET UG 2025
Online Registration & Choice Filling by candidates on MCC portal
Online counseling & Seat allotment by DGHS / MCC
Reporting to the Institute as per the reporting instructions uploaded on www.manipal.edu/neet
admission_process_foreign_nri: Register, Appear and Qualify in NEET UG 2025
Online Registration & Choice Filling by candidates on MCC portal
Online counseling & Seat allotment by DGHS / MCC
Reporting to the Institute as per the reporting instructions uploaded on www.manipal.edu/neet
notes: Deemed University Counseling by Medical Counseling Committee (MCC): MCODS Manipal, MCODS Mangalore
Visit www.manipal.edu/neet for reporting instructions, after Seat allotment
The minimum age for admission shall be 17 years on or before 31st December of the year in which admission is sought.

programs.name: Bachelor in Audiology & Speech Language Pathology (BASLP)
institutions: Manipal College of Health Professions (MCHP), Manipal

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Chemistry and English with Biology / Mathematics / Computer Science / Statistics / Electronics / Psychology from a recognized Board, with minimum 50% aggregate marks in PCB / PCM / PCO*
* PCO percentage should be ≥ 80%
* Ο – Computer Science / Statistics / Electronics / Psychology.

admission_process_general: Merit List based on 50% weightage given to MET score and 50% weightage to the marks obtained in 10+2 examinations (Physics + Chemistry + Biology / Mathematics + English) Score

institutions: Manipal College of Health Professions (MCHP), Manipal

programs.name: Post Basic B.Sc. Nursing

indian_boards: Pass in GNM after 10+2 or equivalent examination, preferably with Science subjects.
Candidate should be a registered Nurse and registered Midwife or equivalent, with any State Nursing Registration Council.
Note: Candidates should have completed their GNM course on or before 01.06.2025

admission_process_general: Merit List based on qualifying exam marks
Provisional Admission Notice to shortlisted candidates
notes: The minimum age for admission shall be 17 years on or before 31st December of the year in which admission is sought.

programs.name: B.Tech Aeronautical Engineering

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Mathematics and English as compulsory subjects along with Chemistry / Biotechnology / Biology / any technical vocational subject* as optional, from a recognized Board, with minimum 50% aggregate marks taken together in Physics, Mathematics and any one of the optional subjects
* Technical vocational subject must be related to Chemical / Civil / Computer / Electrical / Mechanical streams

admission_process_general: Merit List based on 50% weightage given to MET score and 50% weightage to the marks obtained in 10+2 examinations (Physics + Mathematics + Chemistry* + English) Score
* - Optional subject if Chemistry not taken
Technical vocational subject must be related to Chemical / Civil / Computer / Electrical / Mechanical streams

programs.name: B.Tech Computer Science & Engineering

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Mathematics and English as compulsory subjects along with Chemistry / Biotechnology / Biology / any technical vocational subject* as optional, from a recognized Board, with minimum 50% aggregate marks taken together in Physics, Mathematics and any one of the optional subjects

Technical vocational subject must be related to Chemical / Civil / Computer / Electrical / Mechanical streams
notes: With options for specializing** in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning | Computer Networks and IoT | Data Science | Software Engineering (Manipal)

With options for specializing** in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning | Cyber Security | Data Science | Gaming & Digital Twinning | Robotics & Artificial Intelligence | Quantum Computing (Bengaluru)

** Additional specialization/s may be added. Option for choice of specialization will happen in the beginning of Third year based on CGPA obtained at the end of 2nd year. Those opting for any specialization, get their degree with specialization mentioned within bracket. Example: B. Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science). For others, B. Tech in Computer Science and Engineering Degree will be awarded.

Technical vocational subject must be related to Chemical / Civil / Computer / Electrical / Mechanical streams

* Technical vocational subject must be related to Chemical / Civil / Computer / Electrical / Mechanical streams

programs.name: Lateral Entry to All B.Tech Programs

state_boards_of_technical_education: Pass in 3-year Diploma (respective Engineering stream) granted by the State Board of Technical Examination with minimum 45% aggregate marks or equivalent
Pass in BSc Degree, with Mathematics in 12th standard, from a recognized University with minimum 45% aggregate marks

admission_process_general: Merit list based on qualifying exam marks
Provisional Admission Notice to shortlisted candidates

programs.name: Bachelor of Architecture (BArch)
institutions: Manipal School of Architecture & Planning (MSAP), Manipal

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent with Physics, Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with Chemistry or Biology or Technical Vocational subject or Computer Science or Information Technology or Information Practices or Engineering Graphics or Business Studies as optional, from a recognized Board, with at least 45% marks in aggregate OR
Pass in 3-year Diploma with Mathematics as compulsory subjects from a Central / State Government recognized Board, with at least 45% marks in aggregate

Candidates MUST qualify for an Aptitude test in architecture conducted either by NTA (i.e., JEE Main Paper II) OR by COA (I.E. National Aptitude Test in Architecture (NATA)) conducted by Council of Architecture (COA)
As per COA, the validity of NATA score shall be valid for 2 academic years from the year in which appeared

admission_process_general: Merit List based on 50% weightage of qualifying exam marks (Physics + Mathematics + Optional Paper) and 50% weightage of NATA

programs.name: Bachelor of Design (Fashion Design)

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or 3-year Diploma from State Board of Technical Education or equivalent qualification from a recognized Board / University with a minimum of 45% aggregate marks

admission_process_general: Submit Portfolio of work(POW) and Statement of Purpose (SOP)
Submission of UCEED Score card [Candidates who qualified UCEED exam under open category are exempted from HBT, SOP, POW, and PI]
Merit List based on the HBT, POW, SOP & PI /UCEED Score.
Provisional Admission Notice to shortlisted candidates

programs.name: Integrated Program in Management (IPM)

indian_boards: Pass in 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized Board, with minimum 60% aggregate marks.
Scored a minimum of 60% in 10th Standard
English as a compulsory subject in HSC / (10+2) Examination.
In addition, candidates should have appeared in one of the following entrance tests:
Manipal Entrance Test (MET) OR
IPMAT (Integrated Program in Management Aptitude Test, conducted by IIM Indore or Rothak), for the corresponding academic year OR
JIPMAT OR
JEE mains (Joint Entrance Examination, conducted by the National Testing Agency (NTA), for the corresponding academic year OR
SAT examination (administered on behalf of the College Board by the Educational Testing Service) OR
CLAT

admission_process_general: Merit List based on Entrance Test Score, SOP & PI
Provisional Admission notice to shortlisted candidates
